channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 20:22 Air alert in Zolotonisky district. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 20:22 Air alert in Zolotonisky district. Follow further messages. #Zolotonisky_district This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 20:05 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Chervonohryhorivska territorial community. Go to shelter!
